A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall not a bad movie - if it wasn’t a Star Wars movie. But it is a Star Wars movie and one that left me saddened and unsatisfied. I get where they were going with this film. But they step over or completely destroy good plot lines established in force awakens to get there. Bad move Disney. I’m officially no longer excited about episode 9. I’m not even taking my kids to see this movie because I fear they would be bored by it. Again\, not a bad movie overall\, but no payoff from force awakens setup\, and it leaves you with no desire to see episode 9. :(
